titles.title: O God You are my God (Ps. 63)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God You are my God And I will seek You earnestly My soul thirsts for You In a dry and weary land{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have seen You in the sanctuary To see Your power and glory{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will bless You as long as I shall live I will lift up my hands in Your name My mouth sings praises And my soul is satisfied In the shadow of Your wings I sing for joy In the shadow of Your wings I sing for joy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O God You are my God And I will seek You earnestly My soul thirsts for You In a dry and weary land{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have seen You in the sanctuary To see Your power and glory{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will bless You as long as I shall live I will lift up my hands in Your name My mouth sings praises And my soul is satisfied In the shadow of Your wings I sing for joy In the shadow of Your wings I sing for joy (2x){/lang-eng}
